audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization - identifies inefficiency in existing customer service operations where routine inquiries required human intervention unnecessarily. Pattern is replicable across healthcare payers and other industries with high-volume routine inquiries.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Humana), specific volume metric (1M+ calls/month), clear problem definition. Source appears credible though would benefit from verification of publication authority.
